description.value:
[Ally]

Prerequisites Tier 2 with the Verdant Wheel

Cost 4 Fame

Effect You can select the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Leshy Familiar]{Leshy Familiar} feat as a 2nd level class feat, even if you are not a Druid. You can ignore the prerequisite of belonging to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Leaf Order]{Leaf Order}.
